pages.text: $(li)The Taiga is a cold biome composed of mostly by Grass.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find some vegetation like Red and Brown Mushrooms, Dandelions, Violets and Taiga trees.
$(li)Some animals like Raccoons, Grizzly Bears, Crows and Foxes can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Taiga$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
